text:
Hello everyone,
I have multiple pipelines, and I need to retrieve all the deals from each pipeline based on specific pipeline filters or pipeline IDs. Could you please help with this?
Thanks
```curl --request GET \
  --url '<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/deals?limit=10&archived=false>' \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN'```
After form submission Add fancy loader for a few seconds and fetch data with serverless
